subject: Fix chat store sessionSnapshots isStreaming persistence
description: In packages/web/src/lib/store.ts, sessionSnapshots now includes isStreaming but most writes omit it. Update switchSession/addMessage/appendMessageContent/addToolCall/updateToolResult/finalizeToolCalls/clearToolCalls/clearMessages and setStreaming to persist isStreaming per session, and restore it when switching. Add tests to verify streaming state is preserved per session.
